277 inline bool CLine2d::operator == (const CLine2d& line) const
278 {
279  return ((m_point1 == line.m_point1) && (m_point2 == line.m_point2));
280 }
281 
282 
283 inline bool CLine2d::operator != (const CLine2d& line) const
284 {
285  return !operator == (line);
286 }

288 
289 inline bool CLine2d::IsNull() const
290 {
291  return (m_point1 == m_point2);
292 }
293 
294 
295 inline CVector2d CLine2d::GetDiffVector() const
296 {
297  return m_point2 - m_point1;
298 }

324 
325 inline double CLine2d::GetCutXPos(double linePosY) const
326 {
327  CVector2d diff = GetDiffVector();
328 
329  return (linePosY - m_point1.GetY()) * diff.GetX() / diff.GetY() + m_point1.GetX();
330 }
331 
332 
333 
334 inline double CLine2d::GetCutYPos(double linePosX) const
335 {
336  CVector2d diff = GetDiffVector();
337 
338  return (linePosX - m_point1.GetX()) * diff.GetY() / diff.GetX() + m_point1.GetY();
339 }
340 
341 
342 inline double CLine2d::GetCutAlpha(const CLine2d& line) const
343 {
344  const i2d::CVector2d& delta = GetDiffVector();
345  const i2d::CVector2d& lineDelta = line.GetDiffVector();
346  const i2d::CVector2d& beginPoint = GetPoint1();
347  const i2d::CVector2d& lineBeginPoint = line.GetPoint1();
348 
349  double crossProductZ = lineDelta.GetCrossProductZ(delta);
350 
351  return (beginPoint.GetCrossProductZ(delta) + delta.GetCrossProductZ(lineBeginPoint)) / crossProductZ;
352 }
353 
354 
355 inline double CLine2d::GetCastAlpha(const i2d::CVector2d& point) const
356 {
357  i2d::CVector2d delta = GetDiffVector();
358  i2d::CVector2d deltaToPoint = point - m_point1;
359 
360  double dotProduct = delta.GetDotProduct(deltaToPoint);
361  return dotProduct / delta.GetLength2();
362 }
363 
364 
365 inline QPair<double, double> CLine2d::GetAlphaAndCastDistance(const i2d::CVector2d& point) const
366 {
367  i2d::CVector2d delta = m_point2 - m_point1;
368  i2d::CVector2d deltaToPoint = point - m_point1;
369 
370  double dotProduct = delta.GetDotProduct(deltaToPoint);
371  double field = delta.GetCrossProductZ(deltaToPoint);
372  double deltaLength2 = delta.GetLength2();
373 
374  return QPair<double, double>(dotProduct / deltaLength2, field / ::sqrt(deltaLength2));
375 }
